S

searchPath(Board, int, int) - Method in class pieces.ChessPiece
Searches a straight-line path of cells in a given direction until a cell is occupied by another piece or the end of the board is hit.
searchStep(Board, int, int) - Method in class pieces.ChessPiece
Searches a single cell in a given direction.
setCell(int, int, ChessPiece) - Method in class chess.Board
Sets a cell to contain a chess piece
setPiece(ChessPiece) - Method in class chess.Board.Cell
Sets the cell to contain a chess piece
setPosition(Board.Cell) - Method in class pieces.ChessPiece
Sets the position of this piece to a given cell.
setTurnMoved(int) - Method in class pieces.ChessPiece
Sets this chess piece's last turn moved to the current turn of the game.
switchTurns() - Method in class chess.GameManager
Switches the turn from the current player's color, to the opposite color.
